resources.string: Click on the first icon and select the photo you want to edit. The second icon lets you create the desired background. The third icon provides a previously edited image.
How to add a picture to a picture
Here we can go to the gallery to add more photos to the edit image. You can select a photo from the gallery, resize it, move it to the desired location and click on the right icon at the top.
Here we can add stickers to the image. Select a sticker, resize it, move it to the desired position and click on the right icon at the top.
Here we can apply filters to the photo. Click on the filters below and select the filter that best fits the photo and click on the right icon at the top.

Here we can make the image color less blurry and blurred. From the first indicator, the blur effect can be increased. With the second indicator, the color of the image can be reduced. After making the necessary adjustments, click on the "right" icon at the top.

Here we can crop, rotate, flip the image. If you want to crop, you need to change the setting to crop. Click on the three dots on the top right corner to rotate the image and flip it vertical and horizontal. After making the necessary adjustments, click on the crop button and apply them to the picture.
How to undo, redo and save
After editing an image, you can click on the icon at the top right corner to share or download it. You can also undo the other two buttons.
How to Add Text On Image

You can use the button here to type words and insert them into a photo. You can change the color and font of the text after adding it to the image. At the same time you can give the text a shadow or glow and change the color of the given glow.
You will lose everything you have edited. Are you sure you want to leave?
Please give us your valuable rating to develop more applications like this.
Are you sure you want to exit?
You reached to the Original Photo
Something is not right. We\'ll fix it soon
